alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 29 at 10:28AM CDT until June 01 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. .River levels are slowly falling and this trend is expected to continue over the next few days. Chances for showers and thunderstorms through Tuesday will likely only cause localized impacts. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At Morton. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Riverside Rd and Front Street flooded in North Redwood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 930 AM CDT Sunday, the stage was 21.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 930 AM CDT Sunday was 21.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.9 feet on 04/04/2007. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
